main event: A bright object was observed moving at speeds of 100 to 5,000 mph with no sound over Kelly Air Force Base, Texas, on January 14, 1954.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes,The object did not leave a visible trail or smoke,The object disappeared after a local aircraft came into the area,There were reports of three objects joining together for a short duration,Weather conditions included fog and rain.
witness description: no contact or visual on aircraft
